Problems.heading: Community
Problems.description: Users can interact with each other and learn together

Problems.heading: Jobs & Employment
Problems.description: Users can hire & find jobs based on their skills and demographics

Problems.heading: Schemes & Subsidies
Problems.description: Users can easily access schemes & subsidies

Problems.heading: Equipment Pooling
Problems.description: Users can pool their Equipment for the purpose of Selling & Leasing

Problems.heading: Agricultural Insights
Problems.description: Users can access Real time weather & Mandi prices

Problems.heading: Land Pooling
Problems.description: Users can pool their land to share & collaborate with other users

Problems.heading: Marketplace
Problems.description: Users can sell/ Rent & buy/ Borrow from another user or supplier

Problems.heading: Investment
Problems.description: Users can Invest in land stocks & Agricultural projects
